name: Library Management System
description: A Django REST API for library management with user authentication, book catalog, and loan tracking

SECRET_KEY.description: Django secret key for cryptographic signing

DEBUG.description: Debug mode (should be False in production)

DB_NAME.description: Database name (automatically set by Heroku PostgreSQL)

DB_USER.description: Database user (automatically set by Heroku PostgreSQL)

DB_PASSWORD.description: Database password (automatically set by Heroku PostgreSQL)

DB_HOST.description: Database host (automatically set by Heroku PostgreSQL)

DB_PORT.description: Database port (automatically set by Heroku PostgreSQL)

scripts.postdeploy: python manage.py migrate && python manage.py collectstatic --noinput
